Metrics

Core metrics

class circle_bundles.EuclideanMetric(name='euclidean')[source]

Angle-coordinate metrics

class circle_bundles.S1AngleMetric(name='S1_angle', base_name='S^1', base_name_latex='\\\\mathbb{S}^1')[source]

Angles in radians; distance on S^1.

class circle_bundles.RP1AngleMetric(name='RP1_angle', base_name='RP^1', base_name_latex='\\\\mathbb{RP}^1')[source]

Angles in radians; theta ~ theta+pi. Accepts any real angles.

class circle_bundles.T2FlatMetric(name='T2_flat', base_name='T^2', base_name_latex='\\\\mathbb{T}^2')[source]

Flat torus distance for coords in [0,2pi)^2 (angles).

Unit-vector metrics

class circle_bundles.S1UnitVectorMetric(name='S1_unitvec', base_name='S^1', base_name_latex='\\\\mathbb{S}^1')[source]

Unit vectors in R^2; geodesic distance arccos(<p,q>).

class circle_bundles.RP1UnitVectorMetric(name='RP1_unitvec', base_name='RP^1', base_name_latex='\\\\mathbb{RP}^1')[source]

Unit vectors in R^2 with antipodal ID; distance arccos(|<p,q>|).

class circle_bundles.RP2UnitVectorMetric(name='RP2_unitvec', base_name='RP^2', base_name_latex='\\\\mathbb{RP}^2')[source]

Unit vectors in R^3 with antipodal ID; min(||p-q||, ||p+q||).

Quotient / model metrics

class circle_bundles.Torus_Z2QuotientMetric_R4(kind='klein', *, base_in='z2')[source]

Factory for Z2 quotient metrics on a C^2 torus embedded in R^4.

Return type:

Metric

kind:

  • “klein”: (b,f)~(b+pi,-f)

  • “diag”: (b,f)~(b+pi,f+pi)

base_in:

  • “z1” (default) or “z2” (for klein; diag is symmetric but accepted)

class circle_bundles.RP2_TrivialMetric[source]

Trivial circle bundle over RP^2: (v,z)~(-v,z).

Return type:

Z2QuotientMetricR5

class circle_bundles.RP2_TwistMetric[source]

Orientable nontrivial (monodromy -1): (v,z)~(-v,-z).

Return type:

Z2QuotientMetricR5

class circle_bundles.RP2_FlipMetric[source]

Non-orientable (reflection on fiber): (v,z)~(-v,conj z).

Return type:

Z2QuotientMetricR5

class circle_bundles.S3QuotientMetric(p, *, v_axis=array([1., 0., 0.]), antipodal=False, base='geodesic', u_axis=None, name=None)[source]
Return type:

Metric
